text: Me uariv sogha ghua, Devitɨn mɨdorozir gumaziba bar Israelia abɨnigha bar me gasɨghasɨki. Mɨdorozim bar ekevegha bar distrighɨn danganiba bar a da ini. Gumazir bar avɨrim ruarimɨn aven tintinibar onganigha ariaghire. Kamagh amizɨ ruarimɨn aven ariaghirezibar dɨbobonim, a mɨdorozimɨn ariaghirezir darazir dɨbobonim gafira. Mɨdorozir gumazir dughiar kamran ariaghireziba bar dar dɨbobonim, 20,000ɨn tu.
